column1: hobert lee quesinberry| hobert lee quesinberry. born: march 13
column10: 2015 at his home. born on march 13
column12: he was a son of sandra sutherland quesinberry sexton of princeton and the late gary wayne quesinberry. he had been a resident of princeton for 20 years and formerly worked for sylvania lighting. survivors include: mother: sandra sutherland quesinberry sexton of princeton son: brandon quesinberry of martinsville
column13: va daughter: amber quesinberry of martinsville
column14: va brothers: tony quesinberry of princeton	david quesinberry of princeton	danny quesinberry of princeton	gary quesinberry
column16: sc half-sister: christina renee quesinberry of brushfork funeral services will be conducted on tuesday
column18: 2015 at 7:00 pm at the cravens-shires funeral home chapel in bluewell. friends may call on tuesday from 6:00-8:00pm at the funeral home. online condolences will be accepted at www. cravens-shires. com cravens-shires funeral home
